name: HMHomeManagerDelegate
desc: An interface the home manager uses to communicate changes to the state of the home network.

items.name: func homeManagerDidUpdateHomes(HMHomeManager)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the home manager updated its collection of homes.

items.name: func homeManager(HMHomeManager, didAdd: HMHome)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the home manager added a home.

items.name: func homeManager(HMHomeManager, didRemove: HMHome)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the home manager removed a home.

items.name: func homeManagerDidUpdatePrimaryHome(HMHomeManager)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the home manager updated its primary home.

items.name: func homeManager(HMHomeManager, didReceiveAddAccessoryRequest: HMAddAccessoryRequest)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to add an accessory to a home by using a setup payload.

items.name: class HMAddAccessoryRequest
items.desc: A request to add an accessory to a particular home.

items.name: func homeManager(HMHomeManager, didUpdate: HMHomeManagerAuthorizationStatus)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the authorization status changes.
